snippet: Former Representative Barney Frank said Friday that he had asked Gov. Deval Patrick to appoint him to fill the Senate seat held by John Kerry until voters could choose a successor.
abstract: Former Rep Barney Frank says he has asked Massachusetts Gov Deval Patrick to appoint him to fill Senate seat held by John Kerry until voters choose a successor.
lead_paragraph: Former Representative Barney Frank said Friday that he had asked Gov. Deval Patrick to appoint him to fill the Senate seat held by John Kerry until voters could choose a successor.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Frank Seeks Temporary Job in Senate
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Frank Seeks Temporary Job In Senate
